actually you were hateful when you called people lazy and self-important for using the service if not disabled. I would gladly pay the tiny fee to have people shop for me because I have 3 kids and dont have time for bs when Im trying to squeeze in a grocery trip before work. And good for you, taking your kids with you, but guess what? This is a different day and age and I can keep everyone happy and in the car while grabbing groceries. It sounds like maybe you need to find a new job if pushing a cart around upsets you.

My husband has MRSA and we've discovered that if we cover the area with a cotton ball soaked in castor oil over night when he feels the first twinge from a pending outbreak, the soar never materializes and goes completely away within 24 hours. We also strongly increased the alkalinity of food and drink that he intakes to help keep the disease at bay. We're so very happy to report that using these two tactics has kept him outbreak for over two years!!!
Stupid lives on forever.

Strict time schedules? Um...I believe those time schedules can be adjusted and make allowance for ships to not hit and kill a whale or two or a hundred. Maybe hire whale spotters during the migration months, or all year round, to spot and track whales and communicate with the incoming and outgoing ships the long and lat coordinates of the whales. Just an out there what if thought. The lack of decency and common sense of some individuals is appalling. Adjusting time schedules...Not rocket science. All creatures great and small have the right to life. Holy Moby Dick Batman!
